metadata.dc:author: Amérigo Navarro, J
Martín Lacave, I
Fernández-Novoa, M C
Galera, H
González Cámpora, R
metadata.dc:description: The authors make a review of the endocrine pancreas cell and its tumors, describing the main histochemical, immunohistochemical, ultrastructural and clinical features.
metadata.dc:title: Anatomiá patológica de las neoplasias del páncreas. II. Tumores del páncreas endocrino.
[Pathological anatomy of neoplasms of the pancreas. II. Tumors of the endocrine pancreas].
